statements: SELECT * FROM robot_movement;
SELECT robot_id, current_position, destination FROM robot_movement WHERE speed > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, distance_traveled FROM robot_movement WHERE direction = 'north' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT robot_id, speed, distance_traveled FROM robot_movement WHERE speed < 1.0 AND direction = 'east';
SELECT id, current_position FROM robot_movement WHERE current_position LIKE '%kitchen%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM robot_movement WHERE robot_id = 'a47c7c16-237b-4e6a-b12f-07a0ce9c4f07';
SELECT current_position, destination, speed FROM robot_movement WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, current_position, destination, direction FROM robot_movement WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT robot_id, current_position, destination FROM robot_movement WHERE distance_traveled BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM robot_movement WHERE speed < 30 AND direction = 'north' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_movement_history;
SELECT robot_id, location FROM robot_movement_history WHERE movement_type='forward';
SELECT timestamp, location FROM robot_movement_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT movement_type FROM robot_movement_history;
SELECT * FROM navigation_history WHERE navigation_type='manual' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM robot_movement_history WHERE movement_type = 'Forward' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM robot_movement_history GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT robot_id, COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations FROM robot_movement_history GROUP BY robot_id ORDER BY unique_locations DESC;
SELECT robot_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_movement FROM robot_movement_history GROUP BY robot_id;
SELECT * FROM navigation_history WHERE navigation_type = 'Pathfinding' AND start_location = 'A' AND end_location = 'B';
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations;
SELECT id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM RobotLocations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, command FROM MovementCommands ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT from_location, to_location FROM NavigationHistory WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT AVG(x_coordinate), MAX(y_coordinate) FROM RobotLocations;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM RobotLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, from_location, to_location FROM NavigationHistory WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT command FROM MovementCommands WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations JOIN NavigationHistory ON RobotLocations.id = NavigationHistory.id WHERE x_coordinate > 0 AND y_coordinate < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations
SELECT location_name, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM RobotLocations
SELECT robot_id, location_name, timestamp FROM RobotLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM RobotPaths WHERE distance > 100
SELECT robot_id, start_location, end_location, path_time FROM RobotPaths ORDER BY path_time
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM RobotLocations WHERE location_name LIKE '%warehouse%';
SELECT path_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM RobotPaths WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM PathHistory WHERE completed = true ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, battery_level, status FROM RobotStatus WHERE battery_level < 50;
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations;
SELECT location_id, robot_id, timestamp FROM RobotStatus;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM RobotLocations WHERE robot_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RobotPaths ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT robot_id, operational_status FROM RobotStatus WHERE operational_status = 'offline';
SELECT * FROM RobotLocations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM RobotLocations WHERE robot_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT path_id, robot_id, timestamp, JSON_LENGTH(path_data) AS path_length FROM RobotPaths WHERE robot_id = 3 AND TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01';
SELECT robot_id, AVG(battery_status) AS avg_battery_status FROM RobotStatus GROUP BY robot_id HAVING AVG(battery_status) > 50;
SELECT error_id, robot_id, timestamp, error_message FROM RobotErrors WHERE timestamp > '2021-03-01' AND error_message LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
